articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy Z TriFold Is a Phone-Tablet Hybrid With a Clear Purpose - CNET
articles.description: I got my hands on the new foldable at CES. It feels like a wildly practical two-in-one device, thanks to the massive display and overall sleek build.
